payload: All acceptance criteria met - FrostGuard migration docs and scaffold complete
FrostGuard migration docs/infra complete. Fixed CRLF in scripts. All acceptance criteria met.
Fix Phase 1-2 spec violations: AC-4 docker-compose.yml location (is docker/docker-compose.yml, should be root), AC-7 DATABASE_MIGRATION_PLAN.md missing Related Documents section
Fix pgbouncer image: bitnami/pgbouncer:latest not found, need alternative
Fix pgbouncer Docker image - bitnami/pgbouncer:latest does not exist, need to use edoburu/pgbouncer:1.21.0-p0
Vite/React build succeeded. dist/ created with 11 precached entries (2620KB). Note: had to reinstall node_modules due to rollup module issue.
